attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
due to the lack of security provided RFID chips should not be used in passports.

They provide security by saying this passport is correct by providing a digital copy of the information page and relating this to the barcode at the bottom of the page.

This is not secure as once a copy, even by photocopying the information page and searching the internet, information and clones of the passport and yet to be introduced ID cards can be made.

Unless our personal information can be secure, which this technology has ben proven not to be, it should not be used as part of any identification system in this country.  

It threatens our means of securing our own personal identity.
